tweet: The Bad: threw up at mile 2 of the Troy Turkey Trot.  The Good: got a medal to show for it, and stomach is empty so I'm ready to EAT!
Being old and lame by staying in on the biggest night to go out.
Apparently Albany is "cracking down on window tint".  Wonder how long it will be till I get pulled over... *rolls down windows, cranks heat*
